sections.Trivia:
- Riko Mizohashi's vehicle is a dandelion yellow Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution V.
- Futoshi Shimodori's vehicle is an arctic white pearl 2003 Subaru Legacy 2.0 GT LIMITED [BL5].
- Atsuo Chuda's vehicle is a WRX blue mica pearl 2000 Subaru Impreza WRX [GDB-C].
- Gunpei Furuki's vehicle is a silver Mercedes-Benz CLS [C219] & Red Pearl Nissan Laurel Club S [C35].
- Akira Shimodori's vehicle in the accident was a white 1999 Nissan Silvia Spec-R [S15].
